title: Argall Plumbing
description: A clean, professional one-pager created for a local small business. Designed in Photoshop and built in Wordpress, featuring a custom theme, responsive layout, testimonial slider, and Google Maps integration.

title: Eos Consulting
description: A clean, professional one-pager created for a local small business. Designed in Photoshop and built in Wordpress, featuring a custom theme, responsive layout, testimonial slider, and Google Maps integration.

title: Kirb
tagline: Startup with an aim to revolutionize parking
description: Kirb's innovative app hopes to solve the problem of finding parking by allowing anyone to rent out their parking space. I developed and was heavily involved in the design process of Kirb's 12-page website, which features a fluidly resizing header, masonry layout, and animated loading overlay.

title: Tiro Security
description: Tiro Security offers effective security solutions and security recruitment services. I was tasked with building Tiro's new, redesigned website. The modern site is created in Wordpress and includes a cycling video header and a custom job board.

title: OptIn
tagline: Employment solutions for women returning to the workforce
description: Hailed as one of the top 20 most interesting startups of 2015 by TechCrunch, OptIn caters to an underappreciated demographic: women, especially mothers, returning to work after years absent from the workforce. The project was large in scope, consisting of both a Wordpress website/blog and an employment web application built on Node.js. As the lead front-end developer, I worked with a team and personally created the front-end infrastucture and user experience, resulting in a job platform that is both effective and enjoyable to use.

title: Think Content
tagline: New York-based content marketing & strategy agency
description: With an impressive range of services, ThinkContent produces everything from websites to custom recipes. Their reach extends into advertising, social media, and email marketing. The agency was unhappy with their last developer, so I was brought on to develop their newly redesigned website. It features a pure CSS loading overlay and parallax background effects.

title: Patricia Sullivan Yoga
tagline: Part small business, part art showcase
description: I completely redesigned Patricia's local studio website with a focus on simplicity and elegance. After mocking up the design in Photoshop, I built a custom theme in Wordpress. Patricia's site is fully responsive and includes a full newsletter implementation and custom subscribe box.

title: Red Bridge Law
description: A modern one-pager for an up-and-coming law firm. From the original Photoshop design I built a responsive Wordpress theme, equipped with HTML5 video background and a custom slider powered by CSS3 animation.

title: Watch This
description: I built this web app as an experiment and to learn the Meteor platform. Watch This allows people to share YouTube videos and watch them in sync. Load up a video and invite anyone by giving them the unique URL. The creator of the room controls the video; everyone watching stays in sync. Includes an implementation of YouTube instant search and chatroom functionality.
